From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Razor Claw rises to his feat. he still carried the scars of his battle with
Mobster but his internal systems had repaired him to the point where he
could carry himself. he heard Ice in his head giving him instructions.

"Razor Claw, try to get back inside the CF for repairs." Ice instructed, her
thoughts sounding like drumbeats in his head.

"The shields are up, I can't get in." The raptor responded, he didn't intend
to say anything out loud but he wasn't fully thinking. His Predacon program
wouldn't allow him access through the shields trapping him outside.
"Requesting permission to get the frag away from here." he questioned his
leader hoping she'd see that he wasn't doing anyone any good at the battle.

"Just don't stray to far. We may need your help again." She was glad to hear
that he was alright now she had to find Lunarpine.

Razor Claw left the battlefield trying to get somewhere where he could get
repaired. He caught a scent of someone who'd already left. he decided to
follow and see just who it was he smelled.
